item.biomech.power_leggings.tooltip2: After a half-second, you gain increased jump height.
item.biomech.power_leggings.tooltip3: Afterwards, each half-second crouched increases jump height even further.
item.biomech.hovertech_leggings.tooltip1: Causes the user to hover above the ground, rendering ground effects harmless and increasing jump height by 1 block.
item.biomech.hovertech_leggings.tooltip2: Also grants the wearer slowfall during falls.
item.biomech.hovertech_leggings.tooltip3: Press '{key_leggings}' to toggle on/off.  Crouch to temporarily disable.
item.biomech.illuminator.tooltip1: Lights up the area in front of you.
item.biomech.emergency_forcefield_unit.t: Erects a forcefield, shielding you from harm for {forcefield_duration} seconds.
While the forcefield is active, you are granted health regeneration.
You are slowed and cannot act while the forcefield is active.
item.biomech.drill_arm.tooltip2: Hold to mine any pickaxe-mineable block.
item.biomech.drill_arm.tooltip3: Mines in a 3x3 area (pickaxe blocks only).
item.biomech.power_arm.tooltip1: Increases attack damage by {flat_damage_boost} when wielding a weapon.
item.biomech.teleportation_crystal.toolt: Hold '{key_back}' for {teleport_hold_time} seconds to teleport home.
After teleporting home, use again (within {teleport_back_time} minutes) to teleport back to where you teleported from.
Taking damage will interrupt the teleport.
item.biomech.mining_laser_arm.tooltip2: Hold to mine any pickaxe-mineable block.
item.biomech.mining_laser_arm.tooltip3: The longer you hold, the stronger it is (max {mining_laser_max_time} seconds - up to {mining_laser_max_power}x faster).
item.biomech.lavastride_leggings.tooltip: Allows the user to walk on the surface of lava.
item.biomech.power_chest.tooltip1: Once every 30 seconds, reduces the damage of the next incoming direct damage attack by 50%.
item.biomech.power_helmet.tooltip1: Non-critical attacks have a {crit_boost}% chance to instead be a critical strike.
item.biomech.scuba_tank.tooltip2: While energy holds, you will have air to breath.
item.biomech.scuba_tank.tooltip3: Prevents energy regeneration while supplying air.
item.biomech.jetpack.tooltip1: Hold spacebar while airborne to activate.
item.biomech.jetpack.tooltip3: Provides vertical thrust.  If an elytra is active, provides forward thrust.
item.biomech.colossus_chestplate.tooltip: {dr}% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a {absorb_energy_harm}x multiplier.
§6The truth is... I am Iron Man.§0
item.biomech.cpu.tooltip1: Grants {xp_boost}% bonus experience from all sources.
item.biomech.optics_unit.tooltip2: Also highlights nearby spawners and treasure chests.
item.biomech.optics_unit.tooltip3: §6I don't want to survive, I want to live!
item.biomech.load_lifter_chassis.tooltip: While equipped, increases your maximum hp by {hp_boost}.
§6I don't want to survive, I want to live!
item.biomech.load_lifter_arm.tooltip1: While equipped, increases your maximum hp by {hp_boost}.
item.biomech.load_lifter_arm.tooltip2: §6I don't want to survive, I want to live!
item.biomech.mobility_treads.tooltip2: Speed increases even more after 5 seconds of forward motion.
item.biomech.mobility_treads.tooltip3: §6I don't want to survive, I want to live!
item.biomech.spider_walkers.tooltip1: Hold '{alt}' while walking into a wall to activate.
item.biomech.spider_walkers.tooltip2: Climbs walls while active.  Can be used while falling to grip a nearby wall.
item.biomech.spider_walkers.tooltip3: Costs a small amount of suit energy while active.
item.biomech.iron_mech_head.tooltip1: {dr}% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
item.biomech.iron_mech_head.tooltip2: No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
item.biomech.iron_mech_head.tooltip3: Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a {absorb_energy_harm}x multiplier.
item.biomech.iron_mech_chestplate.toolti: {dr}% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a {absorb_energy_harm}x multiplier.
item.biomech.iron_mech_legs.tooltip1: {dr}% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
item.biomech.iron_mech_legs.tooltip2: No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
item.biomech.iron_mech_legs.tooltip3: Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a {absorb_energy_harm}x multiplier.
item.biomech.iron_mech_arm.tooltip1: {dr}% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
item.biomech.iron_mech_arm.tooltip2: No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
item.biomech.iron_mech_arm.tooltip3: Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a {absorb_energy_harm}x multiplier.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_head.tooltip1: {dr}% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_head.tooltip2: No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_head.tooltip3: Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a {absorb_energy_harm}x multiplier.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_chestplate.too: {dr}% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a {absorb_energy_harm}x multiplier.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_legs.tooltip1: {dr}% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_legs.tooltip2: No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_legs.tooltip3: Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a {absorb_energy_harm}x multiplier.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_arm.tooltip1: {dr}% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_arm.tooltip2: No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_arm.tooltip3: Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a {absorb_energy_harm}x multiplier.
item.biomech.spring_loaded_leggings.tool: Increases jump height and allows the user to double-jump.
item.biomech.pipe_mech_body.tooltip2: You have a {avoid}% chance to outright avoid direct damage attacks.
item.biomech.pipe_mech_body.tooltip3: If damage is avoided, you will lose 5 suit energy.
item.biomech.pipe_mech_legs.tooltip2: You have a {avoid}% chance to outright avoid direct damage attacks.
item.biomech.pipe_mech_legs.tooltip3: If damage is avoided, you will lose 5 suit energy.
item.biomech.pipe_mech_head.tooltip2: You have a {avoid}% chance to outright avoid direct damage attacks.
item.biomech.pipe_mech_head.tooltip3: If damage is avoided, you will lose 5 suit energy.
item.biomech.pipe_mech_arm.tooltip2: You have a {avoid}% chance to outright avoid direct damage attacks.
item.biomech.pipe_mech_arm.tooltip3: If damage is avoided, you will lose 5 suit energy.
item.biomech.buzzsaw_arm.tooltip2: Hold to mine any axe-mineable block.
item.biomech.buzzsaw_arm.tooltip3: Mines in a 3x3 area (axe blocks only).
item.biomech.interceptor_arms.tooltip1: Grants a 50% chance to automatically deflect incoming projectiles.
item.biomech.interceptor_arms.tooltip2: If deflection occurs, you will lose 5 suit energy.
item.biomech.interceptor_arms.tooltip3: §6The power of the sun in the palm of your hand.§0
item.biomech.heros_headpiece.tooltip1: Overall damage done increased by {near_damage_boost}% when an enemy is within {nearby_enemy_range} blocks of you.
item.biomech.heros_leggings.tooltip1: Overall damage done increased by {near_damage_boost}% when an enemy is within {nearby_enemy_range} blocks of you.
item.biomech.heros_chestplate.tooltip1: Overall damage done increased by {near_damage_boost}% when an enemy is within {nearby_enemy_range} blocks of you.
item.biomech.heros_arm.tooltip1: Overall damage done increased by {near_damage_boost}% when an enemy is within {nearby_enemy_range} blocks of you.
item.biomech.digger_arm.tooltip2: Hold to mine any shovel-mineable block.
item.biomech.digger_arm.tooltip3: Mines in a 3x3 area (shovel blocks only).
biomech.key.head: Activate BioMech Head Item
advancements.biomech.you_cant_take_the_s: You Can't Take the Sky From Me
Acquire any BioMech part that grants you flight
advancements.biomech.stay_scrappy.title: Stay Scrappy
